name: Interpretation Operator
intent: Map deviations into structured representations, implementing the first stage of semantic interpretation.
algebraic\_properties: Φ is structure-preserving (continuous, linear, or functorial) relative to the chosen semantics on D and R.
Ker(Φ) is a proper subset of D; Im(Φ) is non-trivial.
constraints: Φ must be stable under small perturbations: ||Φ(d \+ ε) \- Φ(d)|| ≤ K ||ε|| for some K \> 0.
Φ must factor semantic equivalence classes on D into representation classes in R.
